thread.title: London museum may return Ethiopian loot - on loan

title: London museum may return Ethiopian loot - on loan
text:
London museum may return Ethiopian loot - on loan Tuesday, April 10, 2018 - 01:40 
London's V&AMuseum has put Ethiopian treasures plundered by British forces on display, and it's in talks with the African country to give them back. But a loan is the most likely option, which may not be enough for campaigners. Lucy Fielder reports.
